landingPage.hero_subtitle: A personal productivity and analytics platform
landingPage.about_content: Analytics Center is a personal productivity platform designed to help you monitor and improve your daily activities. It was created as an academic project to explore data analysis, task management, and productivity optimization.

CTA.title: Get Started Today!
CTA.description: Join the Analytics Center community to boost your productivity and gain valuable insights from your data.
